text: [Music]
the grumpy old men once upon a time in
the city of mow work there lived an old
man called mr. ray and unlike his name
there was no ray of sunshine in his
demeanor he would complain about the
smallest of things and blame everyone
around him but himself for all the wrong
that would happen in his life one day
while he was leaving his house to go
take a walk in the park he heard his
neighbor the old mrs. Kyle screaming and
yelling at her dog why are you not
letting me do my work
let me clean the house will you stop it
old woman how is screaming and shouting
I can't even sleep at night with your
constant racket furious
mr. ray left his house to go to the park
when he reached the park he walked up to
his favorite bench and took out his
newspaper
grumbling under his breath he snapped it
open Friday it can be at peace as he
started reading the newspaper he heard
someone called excuse me as he lowered
the newspaper he found a little boy
standing before him his name was Tim yes
excuse me sir would you be kind enough
to buy some cookies from me you listen
to me boy I am already having a very bad
day please do not make it any more worse
sir just one box please I don't even
want a single cookie get out of here
little Tim ran away mr. ray got up off
the bench and walked towards the
fountain
why aren't there more people like me why
do all of them have to be so so annoying
just then from behind the fountain a
young men dressed in white emerged and
walked up to him why can I not get a
moment to myself why is it that come
down mr. Rey I am only here to help you
who who are you
and how do you know my name I am the
angel of realization you can call me
Angie are you from the neighboring
grammar company
get out of my sight the man was really
an angel and to prove himself he snapped
his fingers and a pair of beautiful
silver boots appeared out of thin air
mr. Rey was shocked you are an angel
indeed I am and like I said I am here to
help you and how is that
take these boots whenever you are angry
at someone and wish they acted wiser
wear them the boots will at that very
moment take you to that person's life
and put you in the same spot if you act
wiser you will be rewarded with gold
silver and diamonds in other words the
boots will literally put you in someone
else's shoes
the thought of gold silver and diamonds
tempted him and he accepted at once but
remember if at any point of time you
realize that you were the one at fault
the boots will bring you back to
yourself I am the one at fault very well
saying that the angel disappeared mr.
Rey picked up the boots and went home
the next day when he woke up he heard
the screaming of his neighbor the old
mrs. Kyle
what are you not letting me do my work
for the sake of the angels let me clean
the house hearing her scream mr. Rey got
very angry and remembered about the pair
of silver boots he had once wore them
and as he tied the last lace he woke up
in mrs. Kyle's house wow this thing
actually works just then the dog started
to play with her get off me Carole bring
herself from the dog she went straight
to the kitchen oh I am so hungry let's
see what the old lady has she found a
bag of beans Oh beans yummy up let me
cook it at once as she poured the beans
into a bowl she realized that the dog
was pulling her dress let me alone but
the dog would not listen it held on to
her dress and suddenly the entire bowl
of food slipped from her hands and fell
onto the ground this made her very angry
and she screamed out loud why are you
not letting me mix food for the sake of
the Angels let me cook something I am
starving and at that very moment he
heard his own voice coming from the
house next door will you stop it old
woman always screaming and shouting I
can't even sleep at night with your
constant racket her eyes widened in
realization and within a second mr. Rey
was back in his own house a teardrop
rolled down his eyes he immediately
wiped it off No
I cannot be wrong that angel has tricked
me saying that he left his house without
realizing that he was still wearing the
pair of silver boots as he reached the
park he sat on his usual spot and opened
his newspaper when he heard little Tim's
voice again excuse me sir
please buy a box of cookies today please
I don't want it in a flash of light mr.
Rey was now Tim wake up Tim he opened
his eyes to find a woman who looked very
pale go out and sell the cookies dear I
won't be able to go today as well he did
not say anything but lay down staring at
her hurry up and please sell enough
cookies so that we can pay the landlord
today otherwise we won't have a place to
stay at this tears rolled out of his
eyes as he realized he was wrong again
within a second he was back at the park
sitting on the bench his face shivered
as tears rolled down his cheeks he
looked up and saw little Tim walking
away with his head hung low he got up
and ran after him wait as Tim turned
around mr. Rey ran up to him and
stooping down hugged him I am so sorry
little fella it is all right
you don't like cookies Oh bollocks I
love cookies give me all that you have
and I shall pay you for all the cookies
that you can make the entire month here
take all the money and bring me more
cookies tomorrow
delighted little Tim kissed him on his
cheek and gave him all the cookies that
he had
that very day mr. ray went to mrs.
Kyle's house and gave her all the
cookies Oh what was the need for all
this oh well let's just say I have not
been a very good neighbor and this is my
way of saying sorry you are too kind ray
oh this is only the beginning and thus
mr. ray went on from being a very angry
man to a kind-hearted and generous
person he never shouted at anyone ever
again
Tim and him became best of friends and
as for the pair of boots well he kept
them right there in his living room as a
reminder of the fact that it's very
important to be empathetic and before
judging anyone we should always step
into their shoes
[Music]
